snippet: How anxious do some parents of college applicants get? A dean at Harvard reported being stalked and receiving death threats after an applicant received a letter of rejection.
abstract: How anxious do some parents of college applicants get? A dean at Harvard reported being stalked and receiving death threats after an applicant received a letter of rejection.

headline.main: When Parents 'Too Invested' in College Admissions Make Their Children Anxious
